response.original_title: Taking the Stage: African American Music and Stories That Changed America
response.overview: World-renowned dignitaries, athletes and artists from around the globe come together to explore and celebrate African American contributions to the global landscape, as they commemorate the opening of Smithsonian's new National Museum of African American History and Culture.
response.title: Taking the Stage: African American Music and Stories That Changed America
